sys_script_include.name: Manage_Ref_Qualifier_Record_Producer

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_fb76e31d1b426550c2e1433be54bcb5b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_liisa_support_ca.Manage_Ref_Qualifier_Record_Producer</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Manage_Ref_Qualifier_Record_Producer</name><script><![CDATA[var Manage_Ref_Qualifier_Record_Producer = Class.create();
Manage_Ref_Qualifier_Record_Producer.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	isPublic: function() {
		return true;
	},
	
	getTechnicalService_requestSupportFor: function(sys_id_record_producer) {	
		var ref = "name=x_liisa_support_ca_services^element=u_request_support_for^dependent_value=" + sys_id_record_producer + "^language="+ gs.getUser().getLanguage() + "^ORDERBYsequence";
								
		return ref;
	},
	
	getTechnicalService_requestType: function(request_support_for, account) {		
		var ref = "name=x_liisa_support_ca_services^element=u_request_type";
		
		var valueToExclude = [
			"after_treatment_system"
			,"electro_soft_diagnose"
			,"si_request"
			,"power_change_issue"
			,"engine_reflash"
			,"dpfunlocker"
		];
		
		var grAccount = new GlideRecord("customer_account");
		grAccount.get(account);
		
		if(grAccount) {
			if(grAccount.getValue("u_internalcustomer") == 1) {
				delete valueToExclude[valueToExclude.indexOf("si_request")];
			}
			if(grAccount.getValue("u_powerchange_usage") == 1) {
				delete valueToExclude[valueToExclude.indexOf("power_change_issue")];
				delete valueToExclude[valueToExclude.indexOf("engine_reflash")];
			}
			if(grAccount.getValue("u_dpfunlocker_usage") == 1) {
				delete valueToExclude[valueToExclude.indexOf("dpfunlocker")];
			}
		}
		
		ref += "^valueNOT IN" + valueToExclude.filter(Boolean).join(",") + "^language="+ gs.getUser().getLanguage() + "^dependent_value=" + request_support_for + "^ORDERBYsequence";

		return ref;
	},

	getOtherCustomerServiceRequests_requestSupportFor: function(sys_id_record_producer, account) {	
		var ref = "name=x_liisa_support_ca_services^element=u_request_support_for^dependent_value=" + sys_id_record_producer;

		var valueToExclude = [
			"commercial_management"
		];

		var grAccount = new GlideRecord("customer_account");
		grAccount.get(account);
		
		if(grAccount) {
			if((grAccount.getValue("name") == "COC - Liebherr Components Colmar SAS") || (grAccount.getValue("name") == "LMB - Liebherr Machines Bulle SA")) {
				delete valueToExclude[valueToExclude.indexOf("commercial_management")];
			}
		}

		ref += "^valueNOT IN" + valueToExclude.filter(Boolean).join(",") + "^language="+ gs.getUser().getLanguage() + "^ORDERBYsequence";

		return ref;
	},

    type: 'Manage_Ref_Qualifier_Record_Producer'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-06 12:10:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>fb76e31d1b426550c2e1433be54bcb5b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Manage_Ref_Qualifier_Record_Producer</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fb76e31d1b426550c2e1433be54bcb5b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-06 16:56:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
